briefTitle: Health Benefits of Expressive Writing Among Chinese Breast Cancer Survivors
officialTitle: Reducing Psychological Burdens Among Chinese Breast Cancer Survivors
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change in quality of life score as assessed by the Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy Scale (FACT)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1) having a breast cancer diagnosis; 2) completing breast cancer surgery within five years; and 3) being comfortable writing and speaking Chinese (i.e. Mandarin or Cantonese)
